title: Shopping Cart Calculator
description: Build a shopping cart system. Engineer 1: implement addItem. Engineer 2: implement calculateTotal. Engineer 3: implement applyDiscount. All functions must work together!

title: Todo List Manager
description: Create a todo list system. Engineer 1: implement addTodo. Engineer 2: implement completeTodo. Engineer 3: implement getActiveTodos. Coordinate to make them work together!

title: Inventory Tracker
description: Build an inventory system. Engineer 1: implement addProduct. Engineer 2: implement sellProduct. Engineer 3: implement getLowStock. Work together to track inventory!
